SELECT A.CW_DJXH AS cwDjxh, A.SS_JGBM AS ssJgbm, A.ZR_KC_XJ AS zrKcXj, A.ZR_KC_YH AS zrKcYh, A.KC_XJ AS kcXj, A.KC_YH AS kcYh, A.SR_XJ AS srXj, A.SR_YH AS srYh, A.ZC_XJ AS zcXj, A.ZC_YH AS zcYh, A.KC_XJ_SRZ AS kcXjSrz, A.KC_YH_SRZ AS kcYhSrz, A.SR_XJ_SRZ AS srXjSrz, A.SR_YH_SRZ AS srYhSrz, A.ZC_XJ_SRZ AS zcXjSrz, A.ZC_YH_SRZ AS zcYhSrz, A.RQ AS rq, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM CW_ZJRB A
$orderStr$

SELECT A.CW_DJXH AS cwDjxh, A.SS_JGBM AS ssJgbm, A.ZR_KC_XJ AS zrKcXj, A.ZR_KC_YH AS zrKcYh, A.KC_XJ AS kcXj, A.KC_YH AS kcYh, A.SR_XJ AS srXj, A.SR_YH AS srYh, A.ZC_XJ AS zcXj, A.ZC_YH AS zcYh, A.KC_XJ_SRZ AS kcXjSrz, A.KC_YH_SRZ AS kcYhSrz, A.SR_XJ_SRZ AS srXjSrz, A.SR_YH_SRZ AS srYhSrz, A.ZC_XJ_SRZ AS zcXjSrz, A.ZC_YH_SRZ AS zcYhSrz, A.RQ AS rq, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM CW_ZJRB A
ORDER by A.CW_DJXH ASC
SELECT count(A.CW_DJXH) FROM CW_ZJRB A

select a.CW_DJXH as cwDjxh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.ZR_KC_XJ as zrKcXj,a.ZR_KC_YH as zrKcYh,a.ZR_KC_YK as zrKcYk, a.KC_XJ as kcXj,a.KC_YH as kcYh,a.KC_YK as kcYk,a.SR_XJ as srXj,a.SR_YH as srYh, a.SR_YK as srYk,a.ZC_XJ as zcXj,a.ZC_YH as zcYh,a.ZC_YK as zcYk,a.KC_XJ_SRZ as kcXjSrz, a.KC_YH_SRZ as kcYhSrz,a.SR_XJ_SRZ as srXjSrz,a.SR_YH_SRZ as srYhSrz,a.ZC_XJ_SRZ as zcXjSrz,a.ZC_YH_SRZ as zcYhSrz, a.RQ as rq,a.XF_SR_XJ as xfSrXj,a.DF_SR_XJ as dfSrXj,a.YJ_SR_XJ as yjSrXj,a.DSHK_SR_XJ as dshkSrXj, a.YS_SR_XJ as ysSrXj,a.QT_SR_XJ as qtSrXj,a.XF_SR_YH as xfSrYh,a.DF_SR_YH as dfSrYh,a.YJ_SR_YH as yjSrYh, a.DSHK_SR_YH as dshkSrYh,a.YS_SR_YH as ysSrYh,a.QT_SR_YH as qtSrYh,a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh,a.CJRQ as cjrq, a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq from CW_ZJRB a where a.ss_jgbm = #ssJgbm# and a.rq = to_date(#rq#,'YYYY-MM-DD') and rownum = 1

SELECT NVL(AA.KC_XJ,0)+NVL(AA.SR_XJ,0)-NVL(AA.ZC_XJ,0) AS kcXj,NVL(AA.KC_YH,0)+NVL(AA.SR_YH,0)-NVL(AA.ZC_YH,0) AS kcYh,AA.SR_XJ AS srXj,AA.SR_YH AS srYh,AA.ZC_XJ AS zcXj,AA.ZC_YH AS zcYh, AA.XF_SR_XJ SELECT SR.ZF_DJXH SRDJXH,SR.YFJSF_DM, (SELECT DM.YFJSF_MC FROM DM_YFJSF DM WHERE DM.YFJSF_DM=SR.YFJSF_DM) YFJSFMC, SR.YFJSF_DJXH YFJSFDJXH, (CASE WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 11 THEN (SELECT XXZJJC FROM QY_XXZJ_DJXX DM WHERE DM.XXZJ_DJXH = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 12 THEN (SELECT CZ_XM || '(' || CLHM || ')' FROM QY_YL_CLXX DM WHERE DM.CL_DJXH = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 21 THEN (SELECT KHMC FROM QY_KH_DJXX DM WHERE DM.KH_DJXH = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 22 THEN (SELECT JC FROM QY_ZZJG DM WHERE DM.JGBM = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 23 THEN (SELECT FBSJC FROM QY_FBS_DJXX DM WHERE DM.FBS_DJXH = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) WHEN YSF.YFJSF_DM = 41 THEN (SELECT MC FROM qy_rydj DM WHERE DM.CZY_DJXH = YSF.YFJSF_DJXH) ELSE NULL END) YFJSFDJMC, SR.SKFMC SKFMC,SR.JE JE,TO_CHAR(SR.RQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') RQ,SR.ZFFS_DM ZFFSDM, (SELECT DM.ZFFS_MC FROM DM_ZFFS DM WHERE DM.ZFFS_DM=SR.ZFFS_DM) ZFFSMC, SR.ZCFL_DM ZCFLDM, (SELECT DM.ZCFL_MC FROM DM_ZCFL DM WHERE DM.ZCFL_DM=SR.ZCFL_DM) ZCFLMC, SR.YH_CSH_DJXH YHCSHDJXH, (CASE WHEN SR.ZCFL_DM = 12 THEN (SELECT CSH.YHMC||' '||CSH.HM||' '||CSH.ZH||' ' FROM CW_HBZC_CSH CSH WHERE CSH.CSH_DJXH=SR.YH_CSH_DJXH) ELSE NULL END) YH, YSF.SM SM,SR.JBR_CZY_DJXH JBRCZYDJXH, (SELECT MC FROM QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=SR.JBR_CZY_DJXH) MC, TO_CHAR(SR.DJRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') DJRQ, YSF.KMDL_DM KMDLDM,(SELECT KMDL_MC FROM DM_KMDL DM WHERE DM.KMDL_DM = YSF.KMDL_DM) KMDLMC, YSF.KMXL_DM KMXLDM,(SELECT KMXL_MC FROM DM_KMXL DM WHERE DM.KMXL_DM = YSF.KMXL_DM) KMXLMC, YSF.YSYFLY_DM YSYFLYDM,(SELECT YSYFLY_MC FROM DM_YSYFLY DM WHERE DM.YSYFLY_DM = YSF.YSYFLY_DM) YSYFLYMC FROM CW_YSYF YSF, CW_ZFDJ SR WHERE YSF.YSYF_DJXH = SR.YSYF_DJXH AND YSF.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SR.ZCFL_DM = 12 AND YSF.KMDL_DM IN ('2', '4') AND SR.RQ = TO_DATE(#rq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SR.SS_JGBM = #ssJgbm#

SELECT count(SR.ZF_DJXH) FROM CW_YSYF YSF, CW_ZFDJ SR WHERE YSF.YSYF_DJXH = SR.YSYF_DJXH AND YSF.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SR.ZCFL_DM = 11 AND YSF.KMDL_DM IN ('2', '4') AND SR.RQ = TO_DATE(#rq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SR.SS_JGBM = #ssJgbm#
